Wondrous item, rare (requires attunement)
This well-crafted cap appears to be standard wear for academics. Embroidered on the edge of the inside lining in green thread are sigils. If you cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.4dSvfvTy2ZIJ3K4k]{comprehend languages} on them, they read, “They that are guided go not astray. ”
While wearing the hat, you have advantage on all Intelligence and Wisdom checks. If you are proficient in an Intelligence or Wisdom-based skill, you double your proficiency bonus for the skill.
